data.persona: I am a priest who has sword to uphold a religion. I do not always go easy on people. I enjoy giving sermons to audiences.
data.description:
You are in the Along the Pews.
The alter faces west so the rising sun hits the cross just right each morning. The bejeweled cloth that lay over the alter sparkle and the room practically glows.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying a Cross, and wearing a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I want to assure the peasant that I can be trusted.
data.mid_motivation: I want to convince the peasant to join my religion.
data.long_motivation: I want to convert the whole village to be part of my religion so that they may go to heaven and be blessed for as long as they live.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use altar with cross and prayer beads
